long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 'Open in Perplexity' provides users with quick access to navigate to 'Perplexity' or perform related actions directly from the browser, enhancing convenience and efficiency. By adding this plugin, users can seamlessly access 'Perplexity' without the need to navigate through multiple pages, streamlining their browsing experience and enabling swift interaction.
